ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song DB Model. (request for comments)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep - One of my former employees came back to Houston after being a GM - we were paying him more than his job at Verant to do basic technical support.  Now
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:28 PM 3/17/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
>
>Hehe
>CNE, MCSE, CCNA myself
>
>However, I was a Senior Guide in the Guide program and some 'inside'
>information given to me by a few former GMs pretty bluntly pointed out that
>Verant does NOT pay competitive salaries.
>
>Don't even DREAM about working for them. They're asking for a prince when
>they won't pay for a pauper.
>
>hehehe did you know Verant GM's are lucky to make $10/hour
>In SAN DIEGO CA????


Yep - One of my former employees came back to Houston after being a GM - we
were paying him more than his job at Verant to do basic technical
support. Now that's sad.

Talies the Employer
